verbs.description: WASHINGTON — Millions of [ARG0: families] [V: living] [ARGM-LOC: in federally subsidized public housing] would pay more for rent under a Trump administration proposal unveiled Wednesday by Housing and Urban Development Secretary Ben Carson .
